description: Service Objects framework for Rails with 5-phase architecture, Result wrapper, and Repository pattern.
rules: Use `next` NOT `return` in authorize_with blocks - return causes LocalJumpError
Always return `{ resource: obj }` from process_with for proper extraction
Never call services from within other services - use Workflows instead
All services must define a schema block, even if empty
Check admin status BEFORE resource lookup in authorize_with for efficiency
Use with_transaction true only for write operations (Create/Update/Destroy)
